snippet: Sight Unseen Offsite, a shoppable two-story exhibition in SoHo, brings the carefully curated vision of the design website Sight Unseen to New York Design Week.
abstract: Sight Unseen Offsite, a shoppable two-story exhibition in SoHo, brings the carefully curated vision of the design website Sight Unseen to New York Design Week.

headline.main: A Fresh Hub for Young Talent at New York Design Week
